org.apache.james.mailbox.jcr.mail.model

Class JCRMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail.model.AbstractMessage<String>
      • org.apache.james.mailbox.jcr.mail.model.JCRMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Message<String>>, JCRImapConstants, Persistent, Message<String>

    public class JCRMessage
extends AbstractMessage<String>
implements JCRImapConstants, Persistent
    JCR implementation of Message

      • createUserFlags

        protected String[] createUserFlags()
        Description copied from class: AbstractMessage
        Return all stored user flags or null if none are stored. By default this return null as no user flags are stored permanent. This method SHOULD get overridden, If the implementation supports to store user flags.
        Overrides:
        createUserFlags in class AbstractMessage<String>
        Returns:
        userFlags

      • getFullContent

        public InputStream getFullContent()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractMessage
        This implementation just concat Message.getHeaderContent() and Message.getBodyContent(). Implementation should override this if they can provide a more performant solution
        Specified by:
        getFullContent in interface Message<String>
        Overrides:
        getFullContent in class AbstractMessage<String>
        Returns:
        content
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getBodyContent

        public InputStream getBodyContent()
                           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Gets the body content of the document. Headers are excluded. Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call, which basicly means it need to start at position 0
        Specified by:
        getBodyContent in interface Message<String>
        Returns:
        body, not null
        Throws:
        IOException

        public long getModSeq()

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        message

      • setModSeq

        public void setModSeq(long modSeq)
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Set the mod-sequence for the message. This must be called before the message is added to the store or any flags are changed. This must be unique / sequential.
        Specified by:
        setModSeq in interface Message<String>

      • setUid

        public void setUid(long uid)
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Set the uid for the message. This must be called before the message is added to the store and must be unique / sequential.
        Specified by:
        setUid in interface Message<String>

      • getHeaderContent

        public InputStream getHeaderContent()
                             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Gets the header as InputStream. This MUST INCLUDE the CRLF terminator Be aware that this method need to return a new fresh InputStream on every call
        Specified by:
        getHeaderContent in interface Message<String>
        Returns:
        header
        Throws:
        IOException
